info.name: Paulin
info.about: Hi! I am Paulin, a current Google SRE fellow at Major League Hacking and a recent graduate from New York University with a bachelor's in Computer Science and a minor in Interactive Media. I am currently looking for new-grad SRE opportunities. A few things about me: - I am very enthusiastic about tech communities!- My favorite feeling in the world is when I am working on a project with friends and feel so engrossed in what I am building that the boundaries between working and having fun become blurry. - I have experience in Web Dev, Machine Learning, and SRE - I usually build websites with the MERN Stack + Typescript - I like test-driven development - I participated in the hackNY fellow program, which was one of my life's best experiences! - I like leetcode!!! - I am so excited about the MLH | Googler SRE fellowship- My favorite thing about humans is that we are so stupid about each other

experiences.name: MLH Fellowship
experiences.description: 12-week internship where participants collaborate on real open source projects with engineers from top companies

experiences.name: Cardstack
experiences.description: SWE intern at Cardstack, which is a startup that is creating a framework for building web3 apps.

experiences.name: Tinder Clone
experiences.description: Recreated Tinder interface with React and firebase

hobbies.name: Soccer
hobbies.description: I have been playing soccer since I am 5 years old and I have been fortunate to make lots of friends through this game

hobbies.name: Guitar
hobbies.description: I learned how to play the guitar when I was 10 and since then I had have many hours of fun where I can just escape to the sounds of the guitar

hobbies.name: Tech + Art
hobbies.description: During college, I made a minor in Interactive Media in which I learnt to make art through programming and engineering
